comments.body: There can only be one IPv6 CIDR block per VPC, so I think in addition to this there should also be a check that there isn't already an Ipv6CidrBlockAssociationSet for the VPC. If you run your example task twice you'll get a traceback rather than changed: False the second time, and this would fix that. Do you mind also adding a test to cover this?
